info.name: Zavona - Parking App
info.description:
### Welcome to Postman! This is your first collection. 

Collections are your starting point for building and testing APIs. You can use this one to:

• Group related requests
• Test your API in real-world scenarios
• Document and share your requests

Update the name and overview whenever you’re ready to make it yours.

[Learn more about Postman Collections.](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collections/collections-overview/)

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/auth/request-otp \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "identifier": "test@example.com",
    "identifierType": "email",
    "purpose": "login"
  }'

response.name: Request Login/Register OTP

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/auth/request-otp \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "identifier": "+1234567890",
    "identifierType": "mobile",
    "purpose": "login"
  }'

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Test Apartments Parking",
    "areaSocietyName": "Sunset Apartments",
    "address": "123 Main Street, Springfield, IL 62701",
    "coordinates": {
      "latitude": 39.7817,
      "longitude": -89.6501
    },
    "images": [
      "https://example.com/parking1.jpg",
      "https://example.com/parking2.jpg"
    ],
    "thumbnailUrl": "https://example.com/thumbnail.jpg",
    "owner": "USER_ID_HERE",
    "parkingNumber": "A-101",
    "parkingSize": ["sedan", "suv"],
    "availableToSell": true,
    "availableToRent": true,
    "sellingPrice": 50000,
    "rentPricePerDay": 100,
    "rentPricePerHour": 15
  }
